definition: paper pattern as model in dressmaking/paper patten
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Repeat this procedure until every pattern piece has been individually traced-off.
sentences.chinese: 重复这道程序，直到每一张衣片纸样独立描下。

sentences.english: Pin tucks across the pattern at the alteration places.
sentences.chinese: 用大头针在纸样需改动的地方打裥。

sentences.english: According to the paper sample, plan how to cut and how to reduce waste of cutting.
sentences.chinese: 根据做好的纸样来排版，做到合理省料，灵活安排。

sentences.english: Do you know the design method for one piece dress sample sheet?
sentences.chinese: 连衣裙式服装纸样基型设计方法，你了解吗？

sentences.english: Slight difference in design or shade between paper sketch and actual fabric printed is to be allowed.
sentences.chinese: 纸样和实际花布产品之间的花型或色泽允许有差异。

sentences.english: Trace-off pattern adding seam allowances. Cut generally around the pattern.
sentences.chinese: 复描纸样加缝份后剪下纸样。

sentences.english: Trace-off pattern adding seam allowances. Cut generally around the pattern.
sentences.chinese: 复描纸样加缝份后剪下纸样。

sentences.english: Cut out and trace the owl and wings onto paperboard with the template.
sentences.chinese: 按照纸样在纸板上描出猫头鹰的身体和翅膀并剪出。

sentences.english: The tailor adapted the pattern to the material.
sentences.chinese: 裁缝根据料子修改了裁剪的纸样。

sentences.english: These shirts are cut on our own patterns.
sentences.chinese: 这些衬衫是按照我们自己的纸样裁的。

sentences.english: Below is a picture of my paper pattern pinned to the ironed pant leg.
sentences.chinese: 下面是我的纸样图片贴在熨裤子腿。

sentences.english: I've marked some lines on the paper pattern.
sentences.chinese: 我已经在纸样上标明的一些线路。

sentences.english: Manufacturing methods of garment top fly pattern are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了服装开襟纸样制作的方法。

sentences.english: The dressmaker used a pin to fasten the pattern to the cloth.
sentences.chinese: 裁缝用大头针把纸样别布。

definition: paper matrix in which type is set
rough sketch (of a painting)/(of an official) to approve a document by signing it
welt seam (doubled over and sewed again from topside)
